resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103607</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103607</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206015</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Alaska Public Lands Information Center, Educational Adventures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alaska Öffentlichkeit Landet 
Informationszentrale, Pädagogische Abenteuer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Public de l'Alaska Débarque Le Centre de 
l'Information, Aventures Éducatives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Público De Alaska Aterra O Centro De 
Informação, Aventuras Educacionais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Pubblico Dell'Alaska Atterra Il Centro 
d'informazione, Avventure Educative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημόσιο κέντρο πληροφόρησης εδαφών της Αλάσκας, 
εκπαιδευτικές περιπέτειες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Público De Alaska Aterriza El Centro De 
Información, Aventuras Educativas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features information on a variety of educational kits and field trips throughout Alaska. Each year the program delivers programs to thousands of students about the importance of our national parks, state parks, national forests, and national wildlife refuges in providing recreation, resources, and habitat for wildlife.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Merkmale Informationen über eine Vielzahl der 
pädagogischen Installationssätze und fangen Reisen in 
Alaska auf. Jedes Jahr liefert das Programm Programme an 
Tausenden Kursteilnehmer über den Wert unserer Nationalparks, 
Nationalparks, nationalen Wälder und nationalen Wildnisschutz, wenn 
es Erholung, Betriebsmittel und Lebensraum für Wildnis zur Verfügung
stellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'information de dispositifs sur une variété de 
kits éducatifs et de voyages de zone dans l'ensemble de l'Alaska. 
Tous les ans le programme fournit des programmes aux milliers 
d'étudiants au sujet de l'importance de nos parcs nationaux, parcs 
d'état, forêts nationales, et refuges nationaux de faune en 
fournissant la récréation, les ressources, et l'habitat pour la 
faune.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">informação das características em uma variedade
de jogos educacionais e de desengates de campo durante todo Alaska. 
Cada ano o programa entrega programas aos milhares dos 
estudantes sobre a importância de nossos parques nacionais, parques 
de estado, florestas nacionais, e refúgios nacionais dos animais 
selvagens em fornecer a recreação, os recursos, e o habitat para 
animais selvagens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le informazioni delle caratteristiche su una 
varietà di kit educativi e di viaggi di campo durante l'Alaska. 
Ogni anno il programma trasporta i programmi ai migliaia degli 
allievi circa l'importanza dei nostri parchi nazionali, 
dichiara i parchi, le foreste nazionali ed i rifugi nazionali 
della fauna selvatica nel fornire la ricreazione, le risorse e 
l'habitat per la fauna selvatica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πληροφορίες χαρακτηριστικών γνωρισμάτων για ποικίλα 
εκπαιδευτικά εξαρτήσεις και ταξίδια πεδίων σε όλη την Αλάσκα. 
Κάθε έτος το πρόγραμμα παραδίδει τα προγράμματα σε 
χιλιάδες σπουδαστές για τη σημασία των εθνικών πάρκων, των 
κρατικών πάρκων, των εθνικών δασών, και των εθνικών καταφυγίων 
άγριας φύσης μας στην παροχή της αναψυχής, των στοιχείων 
συμπεριφοράς, και του βιότοπου για την άγρια φύση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">información de las características sobre una 
variedad de kits educativos y de disparos al campo a través de 
Alaska. Cada año el programa entrega programas a los millares 
de estudiantes sobre la importancia de nuestros parques nacionales, 
parques de estado, bosques nacionales, y refugios nacionales de la 
fauna en proporcionar a la reconstrucción, a recursos, y al habitat 
para la fauna.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206015</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103607</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/alaska-public-lands-information-center-educational-adventures</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
